DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen PAXgene Blood DNA Tube Storage Comments Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Comments regarding the storage of the PAXgene DNA specimen.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Biospecimen PAXgene Blood DNA Tube Storage
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A blood collection tube that uses proprietary reagents for whole blood collection and stabilization prior to genomic DNA isolation._The act of safekeeping goods in a depository.
